headline: Corning Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: CORNING, N.Y., February 12, 2025--Corning Incorporated’s (NYSE: GLW) Board of Directors today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.28 per share. The dividend will be payable on March 28, 2025, to shareholders of record on February 28, 2025.
